main event: A civilian observed a single object resembling a comet move across the sky on April 18, 1952.
interesting points: The object had a tail extending downward and appeared to be blinking., The object was observed for about one minute., It took approximately 10 seconds for the object to go over the horizon., The object seemed stationary before moving over the horizon., There was no physical evidence found related to the sighting.
sighted object: a glowing object in the shape of a comet
location: 3 mi. S of Exit #33, Florida State Turnpike, Florida, USA
